triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The architecture extends a large language model to power the generative agents' reasoning and behavior generation.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Fundamental technique for storing and processing agent experiences in natural language form.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Underlying concept for agents planning their daily behaviors and actions based on retrieved memories.

triples.name: Software agent
triples.relevance: The paper introduces generative agents as a novel type of software agent with memory and reflection capabilities.

triples.name: Emergence
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates emergent social behaviors in agents, where complex group behaviors arise from individual agent actions.

triples.name: The Sims
triples.relevance: The interactive sandbox environment is inspired by The Sims' game design and mechanics.

triples.name: Reflection (computer programming)
triples.relevance: The agent architecture includes a reflection component that synthesizes memories into higher-level reflections.

triples.name: Memory hierarchy
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel memory architecture with observation, synthesis into reflections, and dynamic retrieval.
